src:
Stefano Sensi Merapat ke Barcelona?
03 Nov 2019, 02:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah kabar buruk datang bagi Inter Milan. Pemain andalan mereka, Stefano Sensi diberitakan bakal bergabung dengan Barcelona di tahun 2020.
Sensi merupakan pemain yang bergabung dengan Inter Milan di musim panas ini. Ia dipinjam dari Sassuolo dengan opsi pembelian permanen di akhir musim nanti.
Sejauh ini Sensi menjadi salah satu pemain yang paling bersinar di skuat Inter Milan. Alhasil bakat besarnya diendus oleh Barcelona yang tertarik memboyongnya ke Catalunya.
Dilansir Sport, Barcelona diberitakan semakin dekat untuk mendatangkan Sensi. Mereka dikabarkan mulai memproses transfer sang gelandang ke Catalunya.

Simak situasi transfer Sensi di bawah ini.
text:
Stefano Sensi Getting close to Barcelona?
03 Nov 2019, 02:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A bad news comes for Inter Milan. Their mainstay player, Stefano Sensi reportedly will join Barcelona in 2020.
Sensi is a player who joined Inter Milan this summer. He was loaned from Sassuolo with a permanent purchase option at the end of the season.
So far Sensi has become one of the most shining players in the Inter Milan squad. As a result, his great talent was sniffed by Barcelona who were interested in bringing him to Catalunya.
Reported by Sport, Barcelona is reportedly getting closer to bringing Sensi. They reportedly began to process the transfer of the midfielder to Catalunya.

Check out Sensi's transfer situation below.
